documentation.title: Array Indentation
documentation.standard: The array closing bracket indentation should line up with the start of the content on the line containing the array opener.

code.title: Valid: Closing bracket lined up correctly
Invalid: Closing bracket lined up incorrectly

documentation.standard: Keys in each array and nested array should be indented by a 4-space tab for each level of nested array, so that the array visually matches its structure.

code.title: Invalid: Indented incorrectly; harder to read.

documentation.standard: Multiline array items should indent at least as much as the first line of the array item.

code.title: Valid: Subsequent lines are indented correctly.
Invalid: Subsequent items are indented to the same level as the key.
